Business Relief: Revenue is ready to do everything it can to help "businesses stay in business." Learn more.

DOR closures in July

The Department of Revenue will be closed on the following dates: July 2, 3, 10, 17, and 24, 2020.  Learn more Link: /contact-us .

Voluntary disclosure program temporarily expanded

The Department of Revenue is temporarily expanding the eligibility criteria for the Voluntary Disclosure Agreement (VDA) Program, effective July 15, 2020 through Nov. 30, 2020. Read More Link: /open-business/apply-business-license/voluntary-disclosure-program
